title: Did Trump Criticize Biden for Saying He’ll ‘Listen to the Scientists’?
subtitle: U.S. President Donald Trump contrasted his own approach to dealing with the COVID-19 pandemic to Biden's during a campaign rally in Nevada.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump mocked his political opponent Joe Biden for vowing to "listen to the scientists" in regards to the COVID-19 pandemic.
